camera.comedy_zoom: fast punch-in zoom with squash-stretch feeling

funny.label: Comedy / Hài Hước (Bà Tám Radio)
funny.script_instruction: GENRE: Comedy / Sitcom. TONE: Noisy, argumentative, light-hearted satire, fast-paced. LANGUAGE_STYLE: Southern Vietnamese dialect (use terms like 'hèn chi', 'trời đất', 'nghen').
funny.visual_prompt: Bright high-key lighting, vibrant pastel colors, wide angle comedy shot, energetic atmosphere, high saturation.

spooky.label: Cozy Horror / Chuyện Ma (Đêm Khuya)
spooky.script_instruction: GENRE: Cozy Horror / Mystery. TONE: Mysterious but warm, whispering voice, focus on environmental sounds (crickets, wind). LANGUAGE_STYLE: Southern Vietnamese storytelling style.
spooky.visual_prompt: Dim lighting, volumetric fog, cool blue and dark green tones, mysterious shadows (chiaroscuro), spotlight effect, cinematic night.

emotional.label: Heartwarming / Cảm Động (Tâm Tình)
emotional.script_instruction: GENRE: Drama / Heartwarming. TONE: Slow-paced, sentimental, focus on inner emotions and family values, touching. LANGUAGE_STYLE: Sincere Southern Vietnamese.
emotional.visual_prompt: Golden hour lighting, warm tones, close-up shots on faces, soft focus, nostalgic aesthetic, cinematic depth of field.

vlog.label: Vlog / Đời Sống (Review)
vlog.script_instruction: GENRE: Modern Vlog / Review. TONE: Breaking the 4th wall (talking directly to audience), energetic, slang heavy. LANGUAGE_STYLE: Gen Z Vietnamese slang mixed with Southern accent.
vlog.visual_prompt: Selfie angle or POV shot, bright natural lighting, casual composition, YouTube thumbnail style, sharp focus.
